title: FTP Anonymous Access Challenge
description: Gain access to a misconfigured FTP server with anonymous login enabled.
hints: Anonymous FTP login might be enabled. Try logging in with a username 'anonymous' and any password.
Check the available files on the FTP server after logging in.
Find and read the file named `flag.txt` in the FTP directory.
learningObjectives: Understand the risks of enabling anonymous access on FTP servers.
Learn to identify and exploit FTP misconfigurations.
Practice retrieving sensitive information exposed on misconfigured services.
